title: Optical Device With Stand, 20th century
dimensions:
H x W x D (glass on stand): 16 x 18 x 10.3 cm (6 5/16 x 7 1/16 x 4 1/16 in.)
H x W x D (glass): 18 x 5 x 4 cm (7 1/16 x 1 15/16 x 1 9/16 in.)
H x W x D (stand): 14 x 7.5 x 7.5 cm (5 1/2 x 2 15/16 x 2 15/16 in.)
description: a) Blown glass, stemmed bubble enclosing suspended glass film; film shows spectrum illustrating phenomenon of interference called Newton's Rings.

tombstone.epitaph: Optical Device With Stand, 20th century. Glass, metal (stand). 1960-251-1-a,b.
